charges.charge_description: 26:7201 - ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX(5)

charges.charge_disposition: 55 Months incarceration on each of Counts 5 and 20, concurrent; 3 Years Supervised Release on each of Counts 5 and 20, concurrent. $200.00 Special Assessment. $3,660,905.20 Restitution payable to the IRS - RAC. No fine.

charges.charge_description: 26:7201 - ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX(20)

charges.charge_disposition: 55 Months incarceration on each of Counts 20 and 5, concurrent; 3 Years Supervised Release on each of Counts 20 and 5, concurrent. $200.00 Special Assessment. $3,660,905.20 Restitution payable to the IRS - RAC. No fine.

charges.charge_description: 26:7201 - ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX(1-4)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed on Motion of the Govt

charges.charge_description: 26:7201 - ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX(6-19)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed on Motion of the Govt

charges.charge_description: 26:7201 - ATTEMPT TO EVADE OR DEFEAT TAX(21-29)

charges.charge_disposition: dismissed on Motion of the Govt
